188.heading: Bonking.
188.title: "Blackbeagle Leading his Scurvy Band"
188.author: by Charles Schulz.
notes: Summary: The pirate ship lands, and Conrad can't see because he's wearing two eyepatches.

189.heading: Bonking.
189.title: "He Should Have His Head Examined"
189.author: Patrick McDonnell.
notes: Summary: An acorn hits Earl with the sound "bonk," but on Mooch it makes the sound "poink."

190.heading: Bonking.
190.title: "He Taught Me Everything I Know"
190.author: McDonnell.
notes: Summary: One squirrel drops an acorn on the head of another, with a big "bonk."

191.heading: Bonking.
191.title: "I Mean, Fore!"
191.author: Chris Browne.
notes: Summary: Another golfer shouts, 'Aft!' and Hagar gets bonked with a ball.

192.heading: Bonking.
192.title: "The Introduction is Over, I'm On!"
192.author: Schulz.
notes: Summary: Snoopy sits on a folding chair, about to make his Fourth of July speech at the Daisy Hill Puppy Farm, then as he gets to the podium he gets bonked by a supper dish.

193.heading: Bonking.
193.title: "Look Out for the Heavy Ones"
193.author: Schulz.
notes: Summary: Woodstock gets bonked by a snowflake as he and Snoopy try to catch them on their tongues.

194.heading: Bonking.
194.title: Mônica.
194.author: [No author]
notes: SUMMARY: Mônica is based on Mauricio's oldest daughter. Cascão and Cebolinha tease her all the time about being fat and bucktoothed. She bonks them on the head with her stuffed bunny. She is very tough.
